openSourceContributions.title: Fix DataSource/JDBC connection failure
openSourceContributions.description: Fixed JDBC connection failure to Hive by correcting the JDBC URL construction, changing separator from (?) to (;) for connection parameters

openSourceContributions.title: Support setting max.concurrent.workflow.instances
openSourceContributions.description: Implemented new configuration option to limit concurrent workflow instances on master server, enhancing server load protection and preventing overload scenarios
highlights: Refactored MasterServerLoadProtection with system resource thresholds
Created comprehensive unit tests covering new functionality
